CONTACT.TEXTAREA_TEXT: Enter your message for us here. We will get back to you within 2 business days.

ABOUT.TITLE: Welcome to Sew.am
ABOUT.TEXT: If you want to make computer embroidery, we are glad to cooperate with you. We accept both individual and large orders. We make embroidery on any type of garments, including hats, jeans, shoes, sports uniforms, bedding, scarfs, leather goods, etc. We work with newest cars, brother entrepreneur pro pr 1000e, Jack CTF1201, which are the best are considered to be embroidered eagles, and thanks to it they provide high quality. The images and logos you make are made by our experienced professionals, with professional computer embroidery programs. For details and questions, you can call or write to our e-mail address and we'll be glad to help you.

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.TEXT_1_2: It is determined by the complexity, size and quantity of the order, the price of the design (image, logo, submitted by you)
FAQ.TEXT_2_1: How long will your order be ready?
FAQ.TEXT_2_2: Due to the fact that the orders of the newest car and professional personnel are carried out very quickly, even on the day of the order
FAQ.TEXT_3_2: Any image you sent can be embroidered
